titles.title: A bill to establish a bipartisan Presidential Commission to study the establishment of a National Museum of the American People to tell the story about the making of the American People, and for other purposes.
National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2021
National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
National Museum of the American People Presidential Commission Establishment Act of 2021
This bill directs the President to establish a bipartisan commission to study the establishment of a National Museum of the American People.
